Complete 10-turn playthrough with all features

can create a new game and verify initial state

networth displays using correct formula from PRD

population count is exactly 10,000 at game start
civil status starts as Content
population panel displays correctly
military panel shows exactly 100 starting soldiers

game starts at turn 1
end turn button is visible and clickable
ending turn increments turn counter and updates resources
can navigate to all main game pages
creates game with correct tier distribution (25 bots)
LLM bots have llmEnabled flag set
processes turns with LLM bot decisions
LLM decisions are logged to database
pre-computes decisions for next turn
retrieves cached decisions on turn processing

continues working even if LLM calls fail
turn processing completes within reasonable time
multiple turns can be processed in sequence

game starts successfully with bots
